countries.title: Countries
countries.france: Known for its gastronomy and rich cultural heritage.

countries.brazil: Colorful nation known for Carnival and the Amazon rainforest.
countries.canada: Land of lakes, forests, and multicultural cities.
countries.australia: Continent-country with beaches, wildlife, and adventure.
countries.germany: Strong economy and rich historical and cultural influence.
countries.unitedStates: A land of opportunity with diverse landscapes and cultures.

about.title: About Me
about.summary: Web application developer with a strong background in business management, electrotechnical maintenance, and team leadership. Skilled in modern web technologies and AI integration. Fast learner, autonomous, and comfortable working both independently and collaboratively.
